urls.title: 3 ways for more flexible travels
urls.description: It is finally easier to hold on to your travel plans as the pandemic has moved to a new phase. However, many of us like having flexibility with travel plans. Valtteri Helve, Head of Finnair product offering, shares his tips for added flexibility when travelling with Finnair. The first step to ensure flexibility for travel plan changes is to choose a ticket type for your needs. “Our Flex ticket is the most flexible one as it is fully refundable in case you need to cancel your trip – and it also allows

data.text: Yesterday, departed our first flight to Mumbai @CSMIA_official Airport since 2009! 🇮🇳 The inaugural flight was celebrated with a ribbon-cutting ceremony @HelsinkiAirport. https://t.co/tnPFL9tYkl

data.text: Getting ready to fly? Please do the check-in in advance and arrive early at the airport. Remember to check the current travel requirements and whether using a facemask is still mandatory on your flight. See all our travel tips: https://t.co/FQGzO4jFnu https://t.co/McvqBvqwmu

urls.title: Tips for travelling during the summer season and peak hours
urls.description: We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season. During the peak hours and busier times, the number of customers at the airports and on our flights increases. Busy times are expected from time to time, and various service points as well as security checks may be congested. Also, this summer quickly increased travel and global labour shortages of airport operators and ground service providers, are causing congestion at many European airports. Below you’ll find some tips on

urls.title: Pack light – save fuel and make things easy on yourself!
urls.description: Packing light or travelling with only a cabin bag has many benefits, from easier travel to less climate emissions! With our clever tips, you can feel like a true packing pro. When thinking of sustainable travel, packing might not be the first thing you think about. But it is worth giving some thought. In 2018 we calculated that if every passenger that year had travelled with one kilogram less, the savings on fuel would have covered twenty flights between Helsinki and Tokyo. When you pack five kilos less,

data.text: @Iamminna Työskentelemme tiiviissä yhteistyössä lentoasemien kanssa, jotta myöhästyneet laukut saadaan toimitettua mahdollisimman nopeasti. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair (2/2)

@Iamminna Hei, olen todella pahoillani! Lontoon Heathrow rajoitti sieltä lähtevien matkustajien määrää ja jouduimme perumaan varauksia. Monilla muillakin Euroopan lentoasemilla on nyt ruuhkaa, mistä johtuen laukut voivat olla myöhässä. Täällä on lisäohjeita: https://t.co/4GOK8zGrqE. (1/2)

urls.title: Viivästyneiden matkatavaroiden käsittelyssä on ruuhkaa
urls.description: Viivästyneiden matkatavaroiden käsittelyssä on odotettavissa ruuhkaa kesän aikana. Euroopan lentoasemien resurssivajeiden vuoksi matkatavaroita viivästyy tällä hetkellä lennoilta runsaasti. Teemme parhaamme toimittaaksemme matkatavarasi sinulle mahdollisimman pian, mikäli laukkusi ei saavu samalla lennolla kanssasi. Viivästyneen matkatavaran käsittely sekä asiakaspalvelu puhelimitse ja sähköpostitse on ruuhkautunut. Matkatavaroita viivästy y tällä hetkellä suuria määriä Euroopan lentoasemien resurssivajeid

What happens if lightning strikes an aircraft? For an airline the size of Finnair, lightning typically strikes planes dozens of times a year. However, a lightning strike is not dangerous, as aircraft are designed to withstand lightning strikes. https://t.co/LA9dvtimzY

urls.title: What happens if lightning strikes an aircraft?
urls.description: Summer is the season for thunderstorms, and sometimes lightning can strike an aircraft that is flying. However, a lightning strike on an aircraft is not dangerous, as aircraft are designed to withstand lightning strikes. For an airline the size of Finnair, lightning typically strikes planes dozens of times a year. Pilots try to avoid thunderstorm clouds and fronts. Individual thunderstorm clouds can normally be avoided, but sometimes pilots have to fly throug h a thunderstorm, which also increases the

data.text: Until 28 October, you can fly to Seattle with us directly from Helsinki 3 times a week. When you wish to get off the beaten path after checking out the usual tourist attractions, take a look at these best-kept secrets recommended by a Seattle local: https://t.co/61elRpre05

urls.title: Don’t miss these three hidden gems in Seattle
urls.description: Planning a trip to Seattle and want to get off the beaten path? A Seattle local reveals the city’s best-kept secrets. Liz Johnson works at Visit Seattle and knows the Emerald City inside out. We asked Liz what her favourite less known spots are in Seattle. These are her suggestions. The largest commuter ferry network in the United State, the green-and-white ferries connect Seattle to a variety of island communities around Puget Sound. Hop on board to explore beaches, local food and drink, stunning vistas

urls.title: Effects of London Heathrow Airport restrictions on our flights
urls.description: Due to capacity restrictions set by London Heathrow Airport, Finnair is unfortunately forced to reduce seats on its London-Helsinki flights on 15-24 July. Finnair, among other airlines, under the threat of legal action from London Heathrow Airport, is required to limit the number of customers departing from Heathrow Airport due to heavy congestion at peak times. Finnair is unfortunately forced to reduce flight capacity on 15-24 July and cancel some of our customers’ bookings on London-Helsinki flights on

data.text: From 1 August onwards, pets can again travel in the aircraft hold on Finnair’s long-haul flights to/from the USA. Please make the booking for your pet at least 3 weeks before your flight. Read our instructions carefully: https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR https://t.co/enkVndYMDI

urls.title: Pets on Finnair flights
urls.description: Information about transporting pets on Finnair flights.

urls.title: Kuusamo – an active holiday destination in the north with all the sweet treats
urls.description: Kuusamo is a true nature lover’s and active holidaymaker’s fairytale. Kuusamo’s charming nature is rich in species and delights the traveller with its almost untouched lakes, rapids and forests. The fells, hills and gorges surrounding the forest offer unforgettable experiences to all those who appreciate nature. Whether you're hoping for various astonishing adventures from your holiday or a more peaceful way to recharge your batteries in the heart of nature, Kuusamo is your destination. Nightless nights,

data.text: @AnttiSkivi Hei Antti! Olen pahoillani ikävästä palvelukokemuksestasi. Jätäthän halutessasi palautetta nettisivuiltamme, niin tutkimme tapahtunutta tarkemmin: https://t.co/6bXibWBBtL. Mukavaa päivän jatkoa! -Sara

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

urls.title: You can reduce your flight's carbon footprint by offsetting emissions
urls.description: March this year Finnair launched a carbon offset service, where you can calculate and compensate for your flight's emissions. When you use the service, you join our journey towards carbon neutrality. Finnair's offset service lets you calculate and compensate for your flight's CO2 emissions. urls.title: How to get through the airport faster
urls.description: Save yourself some time and follow our tips to get through the airport with less stress. We recommend thinking ahead, starting from advance check-in that saves a lot of time and effort. The easiest way to check-in is with the Finnair mobile app. When you use the app, not only can you store your boarding pass, but you get real-time updates and other services such as the option to upgrade to Business Class or to purchase your seat assignment. Of course, sitting in the front of the aircraft always gives you

data.text: City of Angels is full of opportunities to make the most of your next trip. Take a spinning class at the Santa Monica beach on a weekend morning at sunrise, go to the outside movies or try yoga with goats.
